mdata.condensed:
17" alloy wheels
Full smart entry system
Rain sensing wipers
Body coloured, electric heated mirrors

mdata.expanded:
17" alloy wheels
Full smart entry system
Rain sensing wipers
Body coloured, electric heated mirrors
LED Daytime running lights
Front fog lamps
JBL Greenedge premium sound system with 8 speakers
Toyota Touch multimedia with MP3 connectivity
Cruise control
Leather steering wheel
Black cloth upholstery with leather seat bolsters
Head up display
mdata.xhtml:
The T4 is outstandingly well equipped with innovative features;:

Toyota Touch Multimedia System with 8 JBL Speakers, Bluetooth and Reversing Camera
Full Smart Entry & Start System
Leather Steering Wheel
Cruise control
Rain Sensing Wipers
17" Alloy Wheels

derivatives.description: T4 5dr 1.8 VVT-i Hybrid Touch and Go+ Protection Style

options.options: Protection Pack, Style Pack, Touch and Go Plus

mdata.expanded: Protect your new Prius with the parking aid system, which will be a big benefit in avoiding accidental damage when manoeuvring in tight spaces. The body-coloured ultrasonic sensors in the rear bumpers link to an in-cabin alarm that warns of obstacles in your way. And for the boot of your Prius the tough, black rubber liner will protect against mud, dirt and spilled liquids.

With its smooth aerodynamic contours, the Prius turns heads in appreciation wherever it goes. Style pack accessories build on the appeal to make a personal statement. Chrome side trims, front fog lamp surrounds and an eye-catching  lower rear chrome trim add those extra details to create co-ordinated yet highly individual experience.
Upgrade to Toyota Touch & Go Plus to be even more connected. This option adds full map satellite navigation, text messaging and connected services.

derivatives.description: T4 5dr 1.8 VVT-i Hybrid Touch and Go+ Leather

mdata.expanded: You can choose bespoke Setanta black leather upholstery, carefully selected for quality, comfort and durability.
Upgrade to Toyota Touch & Go Plus to be even more connected. This option adds full map satellite navigation, text messaging and connected services.

mdata.condensed:
MPG: 70.6
CO2: 92g/km
BIK:10%
Power (DIN hp): 99
mdata.expanded:
Fuel Economy (Combined): 70.6 mpg (4.0l/100km)
C02 Emissions: 92 g/km
Benefit in Kind Taxation: 10%
Acceleration 0-62 mph (0-100kmh): 10.4 secs
Top Speed : 112 mph (180 km/h)
Power: 99 DIN hp
Torque: 105 lbft (142 Nm)

mdata.condensed:
17" alloy wheels (or 16" alloy wheels when solar roof option is added)
LED headlamps
Headlamp cleaners
Dusk sensing headlamps
Water repellent glass (driver and front passenger windows)
mdata.expanded:
17" alloy wheels (or 16" alloy wheels when solar roof option is added)
LED headlamps
Headlamp cleaners
Dusk sensing headlamps
Water repellent glass (driver and front passenger windows)
Full smart entry system
Rear parking camera
Toyota Touch & Go Plus multimedia and navigation
Auto dimming rear-view mirror
JBL Greenedge premium sound system with 8 speakers
Toyota Touch multimedia with MP3 connectivity
Cruise control
Black cloth upholstery with leather seat bolsters
mdata.xhtml:
The top of the range T Spirit completes the Prius range with the following specification:

Toyota Touch & Go Plus Multimedia and Navigation System with 8 JBL Speakers, Bluetooth and Reversing Camera
LED Headlamps and Washers
Dusk Sensing Headlamps
Electrochromatic Rear View Mirror
Water Repellent Glass
17‚Äù Alloy Wheels

derivatives.description: T Spirit 5dr 1.8 VVT-i Hybrid Solar Roof Privacy Glass

mdata.expanded: The sun beating down on a car's roof can heat up an interior to uncomfortable levels. Not with the new Prius. Solar panels in the optional glass sunroof power a fan to keep the car well ventilated. As part of the system, the air conditioning can be switched on remotely using the key fob, cooling the car up to three minutes before you even get in. The solar roof also benefits from and electric tilt and slide sunroof.

derivatives.description: T Spirit 5dr 1.8 VVT-i Hybrid Solar Roof Style

mdata.expanded: The sun beating down on a car's roof can heat up an interior to uncomfortable levels. Not with the new Prius. Solar panels in the optional glass sunroof power a fan to keep the car well ventilated. As part of the system, the air conditioning can be switched on remotely using the key fob, cooling the car up to three minutes before you even get in. The solar roof also benefits from and electric tilt and slide sunroof.

With its smooth aerodynamic contours, the Prius turns heads in appreciation wherever it goes. Style pack accessories build on the appeal to make a personal statement. The body-coloured ultrasonic sensors in the rear bumpers link to an in-cabin alarm that warns of obstacles in your way. And for the boot of your Prius the tough, black rubber liner will protect against mud, dirt and spilled liquids.

The sun beating down on a car's roof can heat up an interior to uncomfortable levels. Not with the new Prius. Solar panels in the optional glass sunroof power a fan to keep the car well ventilated. As part of the system, the air conditioning can be switched on remotely using the key fob, cooling the car up to three minutes before you even get in. The solar roof also benefits from and electric tilt and slide sunroof.
The technology combines the Pre-Crash Safety system and Adaptive Cruise Control, together with Intelligent Park Assist and Toyota Touch Pro Premium Audio with Digital Radio and Navigation.

derivatives.description: T Spirit 5dr 1.8 VVT-i Hybrid Technology Protection Style Privacy Glass

options.options: Protection Pack, Style Pack, Technology Pack, Privacy Glass

mdata.expanded: Protect your new Prius with the parking aid system, which will be a big benefit in avoiding accidental damage when manoeuvring in tight spaces. The body-coloured ultrasonic sensors in the rear bumpers link to an in-cabin alarm that warns of obstacles in your way. And for the boot of your Prius the tough, black rubber liner will protect against mud, dirt and spilled liquids.

With its smooth aerodynamic contours, the Prius turns heads in appreciation wherever it goes. Style pack accessories build on the appeal to make a personal statement. Chrome side trims, front fog lamp surrounds and an eye-catching  lower rear chrome trim add those extra details to create co-ordinated yet highly individual experience.
The technology combines the Pre-Crash Safety system and Adaptive Cruise Control, together with Intelligent Park Assist and Toyota Touch Pro Premium Audio with Digital Radio and Navigation.

mdata.condensed:
MPG: 70.6
CO2: 92g/km
BIK:10%
Power (DIN hp): 99
mdata.expanded:
Fuel Economy (Combined): 70.6 mpg (4.0l/100km)or 72.4 mpg (3.9l/100km) with solar roof option added
C02 Emissions: 92 g/km or 89 g/km with solar roof option added
Benefit in Kind Taxation: 10%
Acceleration 0-62 mph (0-100kmh): 10.4 secs
Top Speed : 112 mph (180 km/h)
Power: 99 DIN hp
Torque: 105 lbft (142 Nm)

mdata.condensed:
15" alloy wheels
Body coloured, electric, heated mirrors
Multi-reflector halogen headlamps
LED Daytime running lights
Front fog lamps
mdata.expanded:
15" alloy wheels
Body coloured, electric, heated mirrors
Multi-reflector halogen headlamps
LED Daytime running lights
Front fog lamps
Smart entry (driver only)
Auto air conditioning
Smart start system
Toyota Touch multimedia with MP3 connectivity
6 speaker radio / CD player
Head up display
Bluetooth
mdata.xhtml:
The T3 entry grade is outstandingly well equipped with innovative features;

Toyota Touch Multimedia System with 6 Speakers, Bluetooth and Reversing Camera
Smart Entry (driver‚Äôs door) & Start System
Front and Rear Electric Windows
Electric lumbar support
Eco Drive Support Monitor
15‚Äù Alloy Wheels with wheel caps

derivatives.description: T3 5dr 1.8 VVT-i Hybrid Protection

mdata.expanded: Protect your new Prius with the parking aid system, which will be a big benefit in avoiding accidental damage when manoeuvring in tight spaces. The body-coloured ultrasonic sensors in the rear bumpers link to an in-cabin alarm that warns of obstacles in your way. And for the boot of your Prius the tough, black rubber liner will protect against mud, dirt and spilled liquids.
